    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Orfeusz megszelidíti a vadállatokat</string>
            <string language="en">Orpheus domesticates the wild animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Orpheus domestiziert die wilden Tiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orphée domestique les animaux sauvages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orpheus domesticates os animais selvagens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orpheus addomestica gli animali selvaggi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Orpheus εξημερώνει τα άγρια ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orpheus domestica los animales salvajes</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Orfeusz megszelidíti a vadállatokat (Római dombormű, dunapentelei lelet)</string>
            <string language="en">Orpheus domesticates the wild animals (Roman relief, find from Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Orfeusz megszelidíti a vadállatokat operaház erkel ferenc bánk bán katona józsef,  </string>
            <string language="en">Orpheus domesticates the wild animals, Opera House, Ferenc Erkel, Bánk bán, József Katona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Orpheus domestiziert die wilden Tiere (römische 
Entlastung, Entdeckung von Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orphée domestique les animaux sauvages 
(soulagement romain, trouvaille de Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orpheus domesticates os animais selvagens (relevo 
roman, achado de Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orpheus addomestica gli animali selvaggi (rilievo 
romano, ritrovamento da Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Orpheus εξημερώνει τα άγρια ζώα (η ρωμαϊκή 
ανακούφιση, βρίσκει από Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orpheus domestica los animales salvajes 
(relevación romana, hallazgo de Dunapentele)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Orpheus domestiziert die wilden Tiere, Oper Haus, Ferenc
Erkel, bán Bánk, József Katona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orphée domestique les animaux sauvages, théatre de 
l'$opéra, Ferenc Erkel, Bánk bán, József Katona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orpheus domesticates os animais selvagens, casa de 
ópera, Ferenc Erkel, Bánk bán, József Katona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orpheus addomestica gli animali selvaggi, Camera di 
opera, Ferenc Erkel, Bánk bán, József Katona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Orpheus εξημερώνει τα άγρια ζώα, σπίτι οπερών, 
Ferenc Erkel, Bαnk bαn, Jσzsef Katona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orpheus domestica los animales salvajes, casa de ópera,
Ferenc Erkel, Bánk bán, József Katona</string>
          </keyword>
